npmScope.x-prompt: Input the npm scope, that can be used to access the common generated typescript types. Must include @

basetypePath.x-prompt: Input the path to the lib where the common generated typescript types should be places. This generator assumes, that libs are placed in /libs. Do not prepend with /libs or @<npm-scope>. The types will be located in <npmScope>/<basetypePath>/src/lib/generated/api-schema-types.generated.ts

superDomainName.x-prompt: Input the name of the superDomain to which a data-access lib should be added. E.g. 'neurology'. Do not prepend with '/libs/'.

domainName.x-prompt: Input the name of domain to which a data-access lib should be added. E.g. 'medicine'. Do not prepend with '/libs/' or superdomain name.
